message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this generous offer and we can both enjoy the money.
Let's be fair, Alice. This split reflects the time pressure we're both under.
I'm willing to be more generous than your last offer, Bob, but time is running out. Let's make a deal!

Okay, Bob, I'm mirroring your last offer. This is more than fair considering the time pressure.
